My Work Process

My design and consulting projects are based off experience and international code requirements to be up to the latest regulatory guidelines

1

Discuss The Project

Organize meetings with the stakeholders.
Set quality, cost and budget restrictions and establish control plans for them.

2

Assess the current state

Define the methodology to use. Either by a field assessment of the project, or a computer model.

3

Analyze and design

With the latest techonologies and up-to-date guidelines, to ensure the quality and deliver results beyond the expected goals

4

Interaction with stakeholders

The client needs always come first.
Ensure that the evolving nature of the requirements do not affect its final result
